revision.comment: A ratio is a data item which i
revision.text:
A ratio is a data item which is formed with two numbers r and s is written r/s, where r is the numerator and s is the denominator. The ratio of r to s is e
En mathématiques, un ratio entre deux nombres est le rapport du premier par le second. Autrement dit : le ratio de x sur y est égal à x/y. review formal definition as both numerator and denominator should be of the same type, not just some data item Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra Quotient
is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000027
